name: Quest for The Black Yard
description:
A sailing game mixing a bit of simulation and a bit of arcade. A father is reminiscing of his long forgotten pirate roots, only with his young son by his side, riding a sloop sailboat. While looking for old mementos, the father teaches his son the ways of seafaring until they come across with the spectral Black Yard.

Use the left stick or left/right keys to control the rudder.
Use the right stick or up/down keys to control the sails.

Done in 48hs for the 2023 Global Game Jam, we will do some updates later.

The Black Yard's crew:

  • Agustin Fernandez (Dasher) - Programmer
  • Juan Carlos Mariño - Music
  • Braian Juri (Akamaru) - 2D artist
